definition: to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

sentences.english: Each plateau will also have a monorail system which will help move people laterally.
sentences.chinese: 每处高地都设单轨铁路系统实现人们便捷的平面移动。

sentences.english: It was enough for the canal to act as an amplifier for every sound in his body.
sentences.chinese: 这已经足够让半规管作为体内每处声音的放大器了。

sentences.english: You see, every scar represents a person to whom I have given my love.
sentences.chinese: 你瞧，每处伤痕都代表一个我曾爱过的人。

along the way/the duration of a journey
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

in picturesque disorder (idiom); irregular arrangement with charming effect
